name: Dundge - GMTK jam 2020 Submission
description:
Dundge is a prototype for the GMTK jam  2020.

The object of the game is to survive as long as possible in a little 2D space. You will have to avoid projectiles spawing around you or destroy them by pointing your gun at them . However, you willregulary lose one of your control, like the possibility to go up, down, left or right. These controls will go away and you will have to move to it if you want to recover them. If you want to go in a direction where you no longer have the control, you will have to take "FlipController" located around the map, to inverse your controls. Be careful, these objets will inverse ALL your controls. 

Make the highest score, good luck !
